column4: Now i've tried everything to get oidentd working, but i still wont, can someone help me? :S
well the server might be, but no restrictions, why?
you need to make sure that you can access port 113 from outside on that machine
now i've opened for port 113, shall I restart sbnc/psybnc or?
just make sure that oidentd is running
you'll need to restart your bouncer for irc servers to see your ident reply
in what way is it not working?
I think the port is not opened, 2secs
